definition: to feel attached to/to long for/to love

sentences.english: The outlook on love and marriage is an important part of young people's outlook on life.
sentences.chinese: 婚恋观是人生观的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: FOR as long as humans have romanced each other, others have wanted to meddle.
sentences.chinese: 只要人类存在婚恋行为，外人就想加以干涉。

sentences.english: But their concepts of love and marriage are surprisingly alike.
sentences.chinese: 但是，她们的婚恋观有着惊人的相似之处。

sentences.english: Escape and rebellion is the main feeling style in the marriage and love stories of Wusi.
sentences.chinese: 逃离与抗争是“五四”婚恋小说主要涉及的主题。

sentences.english: A lot of people head into courtship looking for fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 许多人进入婚恋场所寻找一种感觉。

sentences.english: Marriage atmosphere surrounded by these men from the North.
sentences.chinese: 婚恋气息包围着这些来自北国的男人。

definition: matchmaking/abbr. for 婚姻介紹|婚姻介绍
male and female/both types (acid and alkaline, positive and negative etc)/(chemistry) amphoteric
(romantic) love/CL:個|个[ge4],場|场[chang3]/in love/to have an affair
divination based on the eight characters of one's birth date
good karma/opportune connection with marriage partner
blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
